class VertexShader {

    constructor() {

        this.file = [
            "precision mediump float;",
            "",
            "attribute vec3 vertPosition;",
            "attribute vec3 vertNormal;",
            "attribute vec2 vertTexCoord;",
            "",
            "varying vec3 fragColor;",
            "varying vec3 interpolatedNormal;",
            //"varying vec3 fragLightDirection;",
            "varying vec3 fragViewDirection;",
            "",
            "uniform vec3 vertColor;",
            //"uniform vec3 vertLightDirection;",
            "uniform float time;",
            "",
            "uniform mat4 cameraViewMatrix;",
            "uniform mat4 worldViewMatrix;",
            "uniform mat4 projectionMatrix;",
            "",
            "void main() {",
            "	fragColor = vertColor;",
            "   fragViewDirection = vec3(cameraViewMatrix*vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0));", // Set the view direction the same as the camera
            "   interpolatedNormal = mat3(worldViewMatrix)*vertNormal;", // To avoid translation of the normals use only 3x3 from our 4x4 transformation matrix
            "	gl_Position = projectionMatrix * cameraViewMatrix * worldViewMatrix * vec4(vertPosition, 1.0);",
            "}"
        ].join("\n");
    }
}

export default VertexShader;
